title: History of Characters
body:
So I know that within the League world there are different cities and each have rivalry within each other. BUT I want a semi-simple explanation on what's going on!!!!
e.g. when I first started this game (back 5-6 years ago) I read on {{champion:19}} 's lore saying that it was {{champion:16}}  who turned him into the wolf. Now it talks about him trying to hunt her down but didn't succeed and old mate {{champion:27}} making a {{item:2033}} for him to turn into a wolf......

With the latest story of Shurima coming in. I just wondered if anyone has done a video or a discussion on what everyone's relationship/connection was between {{champion:268}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:33}} ..... The story's just wayyy too long hahaha. Like when {{champion:69}}  first came out wasn't she sister's with {{champion:55}} ????

If they (as in someone from League) could actually do a short video, doesn't have to be a cinematic), explaining it would be awesome.

EG DAMACIA   VS    NOXUS

replies.body:
Old lore was a mess, basically just read on everything after the freljord event, as thats the only relevant lore, everything else is basically obsolete.

CBF with doing a TLDR, just read the new lores, they are all that is relevant.

And kat and cas are both still noxians, cas just went to shurima for ancient power and stuff then got cursed.

As for warwick, just wait for his rework and new lore, Riot is building up to a Zaun event soon with the WW rework, and a bunch of champions heading over there
